name: py-snakemake-interface-storage-plugins

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
This package provides a stable interface for interactions between
Snakemake and its storage plugins.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-snakemake-interface-common
dependencies.description: Common functions and classes for Snakemake and its plugins.

dependencies.name: py-throttler
dependencies.description: Zero dependency Python package for easy throttling with asyncio support.

dependencies.name: py-wrapt
dependencies.description: Module for decorators, wrappers and monkey patching.

dependencies.name: python-venv
dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment

dependent_to.name: py-snakemake-storage-plugin-gcs
dependent_to.description: A Snakemake storage plugin for Google Cloud Storage.

dependent_to.name: py-snakemake-storage-plugin-fs
dependent_to.description:
A Snakemake storage plugin that reads and writes from a locally mounted
filesystem using rsync.

dependent_to.name: py-snakemake-storage-plugin-ftp
dependent_to.description: A Snakemake plugin for handling input and output via FTP.

dependent_to.name: py-snakemake-storage-plugin-http
dependent_to.description: Snakemake storage plugin for downloading input files from HTTP(s).

dependent_to.name: py-snakemake-storage-plugin-s3
dependent_to.description: A Snakemake storage plugin for S3 API storage (AWS S3, MinIO, etc.).

dependent_to.name: py-snakemake-storage-plugin-azure
dependent_to.description: A Snakemake storage plugin to read and write from Azure Blob Storage.

dependent_to.name: py-snakemake-storage-plugin-zenodo
dependent_to.description: A Snakemake storage plugin for reading from and writing to zenodo.org.

dependent_to.name: snakemake
dependent_to.description:
Workflow management system to create reproducible and scalable data
analyses.

dependent_to.name: py-snakemake-storage-plugin-sftp
dependent_to.description: A Snakemake storage plugin that handles files on an SFTP server.
